# Ignore Gradle and build-related files
.gradle/
build/
**/build/
local.properties

# Ignore IDE settings
.idea/
*.iml

# Ignore caches and other generated files
.caches/
caches/
daemon/
.tmp/
*.log

# Ignore OS system files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Ignore APKs and other binaries
*.apk
*.jar

# Ignore wrapper logs
gradlew.bat
gradlew

# Ignore miscellaneous
*.keystore
